events

Interface IAEvent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEPlayerMoved, IEPlayerRequestedMove
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AEvent, EDataMapData, EDataMapNames, EDataPlayerSettingsPanel, EEndGame, EFigureKilled, EInitNewGame, EInitNewGameDone, ELanguageSwitched, EMoveDenied, ENewGame, ENextFigure, ENextRound, EPlayerChosePlayerCount, EPlayerMoved, EPlayerRequestedMapData, EPlayerRequestedMove, EPlayerSetProperties, EPlayerSurrender, EPlayerSwitchedToNewGameView, EPlayerWon, EPossibleThief, ERequestClose, ERequestedLanguageSwitch, EStartGame, ESwitchGameState

    public interface IAEvent
    The interface for the AEvents
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jasper S.
